section.heading: Interpretation of chapter.
section.text: In the application or construction of the provisions of this chapter, the courts of the District of Columbia shall give due regard to judicial decisions and rulings in states that have enacted the Uniform Condominium Act or any other condominium statute that contains provisions similar to the provisions of this chapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 8, 1991, D.C. Law 8-233, § 2(g), 38 DCR 261
